attributes.action: Trigger a general election before involving article 50
attributes.additional_details:
We petition the government to give the people the the chance to elect there representive in the future discussions with Europe. 

This choice should not be down to conservative party members alone.
attributes.background: Considering the major political turmoil going on in UK since the recent referendum it is only right to proceed into the unknown with a prime minister who was directly elected by the people of the United Kingdom.
